sentences.en: A new method, three stage carbonization process, to reclaim gallium from alumna production is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了一种氧化铝生产流程中回收镓的新方法 ——— 三段碳酸化法.

sentences.en: Co - carbonization with petroleum pitch is of some advantage on economy.
sentences.cn: 石油沥青共炭化在经济上具有一定的优势.

sentences.en: Factors influencing pore structure of amorphous silica - alumina prepared by carbonization were investigated.
sentences.cn: 摘要系统考察了影响碳化法制备无定形 硅铝 孔结构的因素.

sentences.en: Good carbonization resistance and low dry shrinkage.
sentences.cn: 抗碳化性能好,干缩率低.

sentences.en: In the optimum condition, the ratio of low temperature carbonization tar was no more than 15 %.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,在最佳工艺条件下, 低温煤焦油加入量不能超过15%,共熔物制油转化率可达86%.

sentences.en: In this paper, the preparation of new materials through carbonization MONT lamellae is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了用蒙脱石层间碳化法制备新型材料.

sentences.en: Modern coal chemical industry has shown a bright future by transferring its basis from coal carbonization to coal gasification.
sentences.cn: 现代煤化工将其基础从煤的碳化转向煤的气化,从而展现了光明的前景。

sentences.en: Preparation of carbon molecular sieves ( CMS ) brown coal by two - step carbonization method ( TSC ) has been investigated in this work.
sentences.cn: 本文针对高挥发分的褐煤原料,提出两步 炭化 法制炭分子筛概念,并考察了工艺条件和产品空分性能.

sentences.en: Pyrolysis section: built by laying high quality clay brickfull carbonization of coal.
sentences.cn: 干馏段: 采用优质高炉粘土砖砌筑,内置中心管.

sentences.en: The carbonization and the graphitization of PI filament were described.
sentences.cn: 叙述了PI原丝的碳化和石墨化过程.

sentences.en: The degree of carbonization of coal depends on the temperature.
sentences.cn: 煤层的炭化程度取决于温度.

sentences.en: The dependence of structure properties on temperature during carbonization were studied.
sentences.cn: 并研究了碳化过程中,结构、性能与温度的依存关系.

sentences.en: The polymerization reaction rate of carbonization reached its maximum at 400 ℃.
sentences.cn: 添加硫沥青球的炭化缩聚反应在400℃反应速率最大.

sentences.en: The results showed that ferrocene was reduced to iron during carbonization.
sentences.cn: 结果表明,添加到酚醛树脂中的二茂铁在炭化阶段被还原为单质铁.

sentences.en: The same raw materials at high temperatures than the - temperature carbonization of carbonization of high carbon content.
sentences.cn: 同一原料在高温炭化比低温炭化的含碳量高.

sentences.en: The speed and development of carbonization not only depend on factors itself, but also on surrounding environment concerned.
sentences.cn: 碳化速度和发展趋势，不仅取决于混凝土的自身因素，同时与外界环境条件有关。

sentences.en: This entails the destruction of the equipment tested, through carbonization of the insulating material.
sentences.cn: 这意味着测试设备因绝缘部分的碳化而被破坏。

sentences.en: Used for testing trend of afterflame , flame retardant and carbonization of textile.
sentences.cn: 用于测定纺织品续燃 、 燃及炭化的倾向.

words.tran_cn: 碳化的，碳酸的；含二氧化碳的
使充满二氧化碳；使变成碳酸盐
